generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with lane markings, typical of a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible along the sides of the road, separated by curbs or poles.
- building: Multiple buildings with windows and commercial signs are visible in the background.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are present on the right side of the image.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings on the left.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible crossing the street or walking on sidewalks.
- car: A red car is visible parked on the right side of the street.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are visible at the intersection.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs, including pedestrian crossing signs, are visible.
- pole: Multiple poles supporting traffic lights and signs are visible.
- bicycle: At least one bicycle is visible being ridden or parked near the crosswalk.
